DOC.brief_summary: To compare the efficacy and safety of tretinoin gel 0.05% to its vehicle when dosed once or twice daily in female subjects with rosacea.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Determine the Safety and Efficacy of Atralin (Tretinoin 0.05%) Gel for the Treatment of Rosacea
DOC.criteria: Female Age 1865 Diagnosed with classical, centrofacial, erythematotelangiectatic rosacea Male, females less than 18 years Females over 65 years No diagnosed rosacea
